Failles et Séismes Logistics (COVID 2020)

Offices — June2020 — FAQ

Offices

Top

June2020

Top

FAQ

Top

  • When can I start to go to my office?

Every Monday starting June 8 2020. Exception for experimental folks, IT staff and Admin staff. You are, however, highly encouraged to work from home as much as possible.

  • Can I go to my office or is there a new office allocated for me?

Please check the table above. If you have a new office please be mindful of the privacy of the person hosting you. Also please maintain proper hygiene in the office by cleaning door handles etc.

  • What will ENS provide in terms of personal protection?

The first time you visit each person should get a ‘kit’ containing washable masks and handgels.

  • What is the protocol to wear masks at ENS?

You need to wear masks at all times except when you are alone in your office.

  • Can I plan to go every Monday then?

In principle, it might be possible. However we need to maintain a maximum of 20 folks at any given time in the lab. The priority being given to experimental folks, IT and administrative staff. For the time being please fill out the table above and the lab direction will decide and inform. Please check back this website again.

  • But I really need to recover stuff from my office, print etc. before June 8

In this case, email Alexandre Schubnel (aschubnel@geologie.ens.fr) or Laurent Bopp (bopp@lmd.ens.fr) asking for an exception. They will try to fit you in.

  • What is recommened in terms of getting to the lab?

It is highly recommened that you try to avoid public transportation at all. If you do not have a choice then try to take them during non-rush hours.

  • What are the rush hours and what do I need to do in this case?

Officially its between 6:30-9:30 and 16:00-19:00. In this case you need to fill out this form and have it signed either by Alex or Laurent.

  • What are the modalities of entering and exiting ENS?

You need to enter the building through 24 rue Lhomond and exit through 8 rue Erasme.

  • What are the official hours to work at ENS?

Monday through Friday 7am through 9pm. ENS is closed on weekends and holidays.

  • For any other questions/concerns/worries please email me and I’ll do my best to sort it.
